name: Great Wyrm Black Dragon
movement: walk 40 ft., fly 80 ft., swim 40 ft.
description: A gargantuan dragon with black scales, commanding presence, and sharp claws. Its eyes glow ominously, and it can breathe acid.
memorable: Its ability to virtually ensure success on saving throws and devastating acid attacks make the dragon a significant threat.
goals: To dominate its territory and eliminate intruders.
relations: Often encountered with other dragons or creatures of darkness, possibly leading broods of lesser dragons.
environment: Typically found near swamps, lakes, or coastal waters where it can immerse itself in water.
strengths: Incredible physical strength and resilience, immunity to acid damage, and powerful magical abilities.
weaknesses: When its legendary resistances are depleted, its defenses can drop, leading to increased vulnerability.
attacks: Multiattack includes a powerful bite, slashing claws, and a pushing tail attack, along with devastating acid breath and spit attacks.
most_powerful_ability: Acid Breath, which deals massive area-of-effect damage and can blind foes.
senses: Possesses blindsight and an impressive passive perception of 22, allowing it exceptional awareness in combative situations.
skills: Skilled in history and perception, showcasing its knowledge and awareness on the battlefield.
additional_information: Ambushes effectively while submerged in water for greater stealth.
Can breathe both air and water due to its amphibious nature.
When bloodied, its acid attacks become more powerful, ignoring resistance.
Can engage in terrifying roar to frighten foes within range.
Utilizes legendary actions to maintain battlefield control.
spellcasting: Innate spellcasting with a DC of 19, can cast spells like fog cloud, pass without trace, and time stop.
test_queries: massive black dragon with acid breath
powerful dragon known for stealth attacks
